user.name: Jeff Thorslund
user.bio: Expert in React and test-driven development. Striving to become a masterful software craftsman.  Take a look at my work or get in touch!

node.name: rapid-riot
node.description: Explore the largest database of Whitewater Paddling Festivals in North America using an interactive map/list interface.

node.name: mamquam-meltdown
node.description: Front End for Mamquam Meltdown kayaking race. Module to instantly create analytics out of raw Slalom Paddling result data, presented on a Front End that was used in a real kayak slalom race.
